raw_body:
DE SILVA – JOSEPH PATRICK,​ son of Chandra Marakkalage John De Silva and Goniya Calimage Jesmine De Silva,​ eldest brother of Bridget,​ Leslie,​ Girlie and Vivian and Christy,​ loving father of Surangi and Ranjika,​ everloving grandfather of Sukie and Aaron,​ passed away peacefully surrounded by his family on the morning of 19th March 2024; his 100th birthday. He joins his wife Maureen and eldest daughter Saroja in eternal rest. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour. Service at 3 p.m. on Thursday 21st March 2024 and thereafter burial at General Cemetery,​ Borella (R/​C Section).
019940
